page.title: 20CLUBS IN SHERIFF HUTTON
page.content: The Bowling Club,with thier enclosed green and clubhouse in one corner of the playing field,is open all day during the season for members, Badminton Club meet in the village hall twice a week in the evenings. The Tennis Club has two hard courts and a pavilion to the north of the village and is available to members all year- weather and light permitting.Football and Cricket Clubs have their individual pitches on the playing fields.All these clubs play in local leagues.Tennis coaching is available for junior members.There are three separate keep fit groups meeting weekly in the term time,one especially for ladies over 55. {Compiled}by:Jill Johnson,Ida Medd, Alison Pomfret,Lynne Shepherd,Hilary Slights and Alma Stracha. {Photos}by:Norman Lilley,Alec Strachan
